main event: Multiple objects were observed via ground radar in Brooklyn, New York, on October 2, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting involved approximately 8-10 white objects of varying sizes from 1/2 to 5 diameters,The observation lasted for about 30 minutes,There was insufficient data for evaluation,The document is part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings and observations, The witness utilized binoculars for observation.
witness description: A trained observer, reported by a civilian
